channel.title: The Complete List of All File Extension and File Type Categories on File Formats
channel.description: Recent content in The Complete List of All File Extension and File Type Categories on File Formats

item.title: The Complete List of Compressed File Extensions
item.description: Saving space on your hard drive is one of the main reasons why compressed files exist.

item.title: The Complete List of Camera Image File Extensions
item.description: Camera image raw files are stored in a raw format that retains all of the information that the camera’s sensor recorded.

item.title: The Complete List of Cad File Extensions
item.description: Computer-aided design (CAD) files may include either two-dimensional or three-dimensional models.

item.title: The Complete List of Backup File Extensions
item.description: Backup copies of individual files and data pertaining to backup programs are both included in the Backup Files section.

item.title: The Complete List of Data File Extensions
item.description: Databases, projects, and saved documents are all types of data files.

item.title: The Complete List of Audio File Extensions
item.description: The category known as ‘Audio Files’ contains both compressed and uncompressed audio formats.

item.title: The Complete List of 3D Image File Extensions
item.description: Three-dimensional models, three-dimensional animations, and three-dimensional project files are all examples of what can be found within 3D image files.

item.title: The Complete List of Plugin File Extensions
item.description: Existing programs can benefit from additional features and functionality by using plugin files.

item.title: The Complete List of Encoded File Extensions
item.description: Files that use an encoding method to save their contents are said to be ’encoded.'

item.title: List of Misc File Extensions
item.description: There are various file types in the Misc Files category that don’t belong in any other category.

item.title: The Complete List of Page Layout File Extensions
item.description: Documents known as page layout files can hold both text and image information at the same time.

item.title: The Complete List of Developer File Extensions
item.description: File types relevant to creating software can be found in the Developer Files category.
